sentences.en: Are you trying to tell me that David was attacked by a dinosaur?
sentences.cn: 你是想要告诉我大卫被一支恐龙所攻击?

sentences.en: Fine, no more dinosaur stuff. Can I talk about fossils?
sentences.cn: 好吧, 我不会再说恐龙的事我能谈谈化石 吗 ?

sentences.en: From there you can look straight down to the dinosaur fossils displayed on the floor below.
sentences.cn: 从那儿往向下看，你可以看到陈列在地面上的恐龙化石。

sentences.en: He stared at the faithful miniature of the dinosaur.
sentences.cn: 他凝视著精确的恐龙缩小模型.

sentences.en: How then would this dinosaur have moved?
sentences.cn: 那么这种恐龙要如何移动呢？

sentences.en: I say it is special because the dinosaur was covered with feathers!
sentences.cn: 我说它特别,是因为恐龙身上长有羽毛.

sentences.en: In Alberta and Saskatchewan there are many hills where dinosaur bones were found.
sentences.cn: 亚伯达和萨斯喀彻温省的许多山区发现了恐龙化石.

sentences.en: It's the new dinosaur museum the university's opening next month.
sentences.cn: 这是个新的恐龙展览馆大学将在下个月开放.

sentences.en: lengthy speeches by some of the party’s dinosaurs
sentences.cn: 该政党那些老古董冗长的发言

sentences.en: Like shark and dinosaur teeth they would break, but then regenerate.
sentences.cn: 它们就像鲨鱼和恐龙的牙齿一样会断裂，但也会再生。

sentences.en: Little Dinosaur liked eating dragonflies down by the river.
sentences.cn: 小恐龙喜欢吃河边的蜻蜓.

sentences.en: My dinosaur and I go to school.
sentences.cn: 我的恐龙和我去上学。

sentences.en: Our great strength, like that of the dinosaur, will become incapable of proper control.
sentences.cn: 我们的力量将强似恐龙, 无从驾驭.

sentences.en: Q: What do you say when you meet a two - headed dinosaur?
sentences.cn: 问: 当你遇到长着两个头的恐龙你该说什么?

sentences.en: The dinosaur is the undeserved emblem of unwillingness to change.
sentences.cn: 恐龙是拒不改变的标志性物种,虽然有点冤.

sentences.en: The fossils at Dinosaur Cove are embedded in hard sandstones.
sentences.cn: 恐龙峡谷中的化石都嵌在坚硬的砂岩中。

sentences.en: The ground floor of the museum is taken up by the skeleton of a dinosaur.
sentences.cn: 博物馆的底层为一具恐龙的骨骼占据了.

sentences.en: The largest brain possessed by any dinosaur weighed about a kilogram.
sentences.cn: 最大的恐龙脑子大约有一公斤重.

sentences.en: There you can see a lot of dinosaur egg fossils.
sentences.cn: 那里你可以看到很多恐龙蛋和化石.

sentences.en: We reconstructed what the dinosaur looked like from a few of its bones.
sentences.cn: 我们根据恐龙的一些骨头重组恐龙的原貌.

sentences.en: You are the only dinosaur I know.
sentences.cn: 你是我认识的唯一的恐龙。

trans.tran_cn: 恐龙，守旧落伍的人，过时落后的东西
trans.tran_en: one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago
one of a group of  reptile s  that lived millions of years ago
